metadata.name: LIFE #1/42
metadata.description:
2866  ×  3727

Michelle is a British illustrator and collage artist, her work explores themes such as censorship, concealment of identities, and the creation of new ones, drawing influences from classic advertising.

A graduate from The Royal College of Art, she has been at the forefront of illustration working successful in publishing, editorial and design for the past 26 years.

Clients have included the New York Times, Apple, Sky, Channel Four and Marvel to name a few.
